name: Rapid Striking
description: Develop lightning-fast strikes that overwhelm opponents through speed and precision.

cards.title: Palm Strike Blitz
cards.description: A rapid sequence of open-hand palm strikes aimed at soft targets.
bulletpoints: Use the base of the palm to strike
Target the chin, nose, or solar plexus
Chain multiple strikes together for continuous pressure
